body.p: In accordance with IAS 38, the intangible asset is amortised over the period in which it is expected to be available for use by the operator, ie years 3–10. The depreciable amount of the intangible asset (CU361 including borrowing costs) is allocated using a straight‑line method. The annual amortisation charge is therefore CU361 divided by 8 years, ie CU45 per year.
